function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor room air mixing and stagnant regions","Impact":"Increased risk of larger aerosol particles remaining suspended in room air for many minutes and being inhaled by room occupants","Mitigation":"Supplement upper-room UVGI systems with ceiling mounted fans or other devices to promote necessary air movement","Technologies":"Ceiling mounted fans, air circulation devices","People":"Room occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate UV irradiation of larger aerosol particles","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of upper-room UVGI against COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote good room air mixing and ensure that larger aerosol particles receive the required UV irradiation dose","Technologies":"Ceiling mounted fans, air circulation devices","People":"Room occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 due to poor ventilation and air movement","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Carefully design air movement in rooms to eliminate stagnant regions and maximize air movement through the UV field","Technologies":"Ceiling mounted fans, air circulation devices","People":"Room occupants","Owner":"Architects, HVAC designers"}]}
